verses.verse: <S%H7725>Return,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> For you have <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> because of your <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> with you and <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> to Him, <S%H5375>"Take<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And <S%H3947>receive<s%> [us] <S%H9185>graciously,<s%> That we may <S%H9608>present<s%> the <S%H6499>fruit<s%> of our <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

<S%H804>"Assyria<s%> will not <S%H3467>save<s%> us, We will not <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H5483>horses;<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will we <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> 'Our <S%H430>god,<s%>' To the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands;<s%> For in Thee the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> <S%H7355>finds<s%> <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>"
I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H4878>apostasy,<s%> I will <S%H157>love<s%> them <S%H5071>freely,<s%> For My <S%H639>anger<s%> has <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from them.

I will be like the <S%H2919>dew<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> He will <S%H6524>blossom<s%> like the <S%H7799>lily,<s%> And he will <S%H5221>take<s%> <S%H8328>root<s%> like [the cedars of] <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

His <S%H3127>shoots<s%> will <S%H1980>sprout,<s%> And his <S%H1935>beauty<s%> will be like the <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>tree,<s%> And his <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> like [the cedars of] <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

Those who <S%H3427>live<s%> in his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> Will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H2421>raise<s%> <S%H1715>grain,<s%> And they will <S%H6524>blossom<s%> like the <S%H1612>vine.<s%> His <S%H2143>renown<s%> [will be] like the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

O <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> have I to do with <S%H6091>idols<s%>? It is I who <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H7789>look<s%> after you. I am like a <S%H7488>luxuriant<s%> <S%H1265>cypress;<s%> From Me <S%H4672>comes<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

<S%H4310>Whoever<s%> is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> let him <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things;<s%> [Whoever] is <S%H995>discerning,<s%> let him <S%H3045>know<s%> them. For the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H3477>right,<s%> And the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in them, But <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in them.
